name: Rule with an Iron Fish - A Pirate Fishing Adventure
description: Become the greatest pirate captain that ever fished! Add more pirates to your burgeoning island town! Listen to all their nonsensical complaints! Fish in ludicrous locations like swamps, active volcanoes and the sky! A relaxing experience set in a charming, whimsical world. Come catch all the fish!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: Single core Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 133 MB available space
